item.title: Government shutdown would furlough about 750,000 federal workers, CBO says
item.description: Democrats insist that any stopgap funding bill included an extension of enhance Affordable Care Act tax credits due to expire at the end of 2025.

item.title: Here's why the government shutdown fight hinges on Obamacare tax credits
item.description: Democrats demand Republicans agree to codify an extension of enhanced premium Obamacare tax credits to keep the government from shutting down.

item.title: Trump administration to expand coal leasing, fund coal plant upgrades
item.description: The U.S. will announce policies to encourage coal output, as the Trump administration seeks to reverse the decline of the fuel's use.
